item.title: SingOn - Sign Language
item.description:
Link

  • ðŸ”— GitHub

Description

SignOn is an android application that educates knowledge of sign language to community and helps ordinary people to commincate with deaf. This repository contains of machine learning model processing code and back end application of SignOn.

Author

  • Alfianri Manihuruk (M040DSX2314) - Machine Learning
  • Mohammad R Chairul Azizi (M181DSX0199) - Machine Learning
  • Fajar Kurnia (C305DSX2368) - Cloud Computing
  • Faruq Izah Al Afghani (C198DKX4771) - Cloud Computing
  • Nicho Abdania Saputra (C271DSX2866) - Cloud Computing
  • Baginda Alfito (A169DKX4174) - Mobile Developer

Reference

  • Dataset of American Sign Language RGB from Victor Geislinger | Kaggle
  • Dataset of American Sign Language Alphabet from Akash | Kaggle
